Name: Stand for bark
Description: The rectangular block has tapering sides. The top part is decorated by a cornice and torus moulding; the bottom by series of niches running around the block. The sides depict scenes of Sethos I and the unification of the land. A column of inscription runs around the block and additional captions describe what is happening in each scene. The bark stand comes from Avaris and was dedicated by Sethos I to the god Seth.
